title.en: A Prayer for the Spread of the Teachings of the Katok Tradition

text.en: Through the power and truth of the Three Roots, victorious buddhas and their heirs throughout the whole of space and time,
text.en-trans: chok dü tsa sum gyalwa sé ché dang

text.en: And the dharma protectors and guardians of the Ancient Translations,
text.en-trans: ngagyur chökyong sungmé den tob kyi

text.en: May this vital axis of Śākyamuni's teachings in general and the teachings of the Lord of Oḍḍiyāna in particular,
text.en-trans: tubten chi dang khyepar orgyen jé

text.en: The sublime tradition of Deshek Pobpa Tayé,1
Remain without ever declining until the end of existence and spread far and wide.
text.en-trans: si té bardu mi nyam dar zhing gyé

text.en: May the ocean-like community of ethical vow-holders increase,
Their minds replete with the three immaculate trainings.
text.en-trans: lab sum drima mepé tukgyü chuk

text.en: May they devote their time to education and meditative accomplishment
text.en-trans: shé dang drubpé jawé dü da zhing

text.en: And by means of the authentic view, meditation and conduct,
text.en-trans: yangdak tawa gom dang chöpa yi

text.en: May they hold aloft their victory banner of Śākyamuni's teachings
And cause the definitive Secret Essence to flourish in every direction.
text.en-trans: ngé sang nyingpo chok gyar khyab gyur chik
